alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jones (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:50AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bibb and central Jones Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 950 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Cross Keys, or near Macon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Gray, Payne, Payne City, Wesleyan, Postell, James, Bradley, Haddock, Greenberry Crossroads and Clinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
